meta.description: Minimize the total travel cost for a delivery truck to visit each warehouse exactly once and return to the starting warehouse.

vars.name: x
vars.description: 1 if the route includes travel from one warehouse to another, 0 otherwise.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(travel_cost[i][j] * x[i][j] for i in WAREHOUSES for j in WAREHOUSES if i != j)
objective.description: Minimize the total travel cost for the delivery route.

constraints.name: visit_each_warehouse_once_A
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['A'][j] for j in WAREHOUSES if j != 'A')
constraints.description: Warehouse A must be departed from exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_warehouse_once_B
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['B'][j] for j in WAREHOUSES if j != 'B')
constraints.description: Warehouse B must be departed from exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_warehouse_once_C
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['C'][j] for j in WAREHOUSES if j != 'C')
constraints.description: Warehouse C must be departed from exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_warehouse_once_D
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['D'][j] for j in WAREHOUSES if j != 'D')
constraints.description: Warehouse D must be departed from exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_warehouse_once_E
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['E'][j] for j in WAREHOUSES if j != 'E')
constraints.description: Warehouse E must be departed from exactly once.

constraints.name: enter_each_warehouse_once_A
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['A'] for i in WAREHOUSES if i != 'A')
constraints.description: Warehouse A must be entered exactly once.

constraints.name: enter_each_warehouse_once_B
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['B'] for i in WAREHOUSES if i != 'B')
constraints.description: Warehouse B must be entered exactly once.

constraints.name: enter_each_warehouse_once_C
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['C'] for i in WAREHOUSES if i != 'C')
constraints.description: Warehouse C must be entered exactly once.

constraints.name: enter_each_warehouse_once_D
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['D'] for i in WAREHOUSES if i != 'D')
constraints.description: Warehouse D must be entered exactly once.

constraints.name: enter_each_warehouse_once_E
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['E'] for i in WAREHOUSES if i != 'E')
constraints.description: Warehouse E must be entered exactly once.
